K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302a-1: a'arya ta th'a ga ta pra ti bimba pra tishtha aa nu sham sa samba dantam n'a ma dharma pary'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302a-3: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302b-0: de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag cig rim gro'i gnas su lhags te 'dug nas bar @302b skabs der gtam 'di lta bu zhig glengs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302b-2: khyim bdag dad pa can thos pa 'dzin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302b-4: dge ba ji ltar bya zhes tshol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid par spro ba skyed pa dag snang la de dag gal te bdag cag gi drung du lhags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis par rig par bgyi zhes rmed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa la phan yon ji tsam zhig yod pa bdag cag gis mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302b-9: de'i tshe de dag la bdag cag gis ji ltar chos dang mthun par lan gdab par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302b-10: gang don 'di dag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302b-12: the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302b-13: ston pa de la bdag cag gis zhu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302b-14: 'on tang bcom ldan 'das da bdag cag la lung ston par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302b-15: bdag cag gis de bzhin bzung nas bram ze dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:302b-16: khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la rgya cher bye ste lan gdang par bya'o zhes bgros so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303a-0: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag @303a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303a-1: btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303a-2: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303a-3: btsun pa; bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag rim gro'i gnas der lhags te 'dus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303a-4: bar der bka' mchad 'di lta bu zhig glengs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303a-6: khyim bdag dad pa can thos pa 'dzin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303a-8: dge ba ji ltar bgyi zhes tshol ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi bar spro ba skyes pa dag gda' la; de dag gal te bdag cag gi drung du mchis nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis par rig par bgyi zhes rmed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis pa bdag cag gis ma 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303a-12: de'i tshe de dag la bdag cag gis ji ltar chos dang mthun par lan gdab par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303a-13: gang don de dag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303a-15: the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303a-16: ston pa de la bdag cag gis zhu bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-0: 'on tang bcom @303b ldan 'das de bdag cag la lung ston par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-1: bdag gis de bzhin bzung nas bram ze dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-2: khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la rgya cher bye ste lan gdab par bgyi'o snyam bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-4: don de dag nyid bdag cag zhu zhing mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis par rig par gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-9: skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-10: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang snying brtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-11: lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-12: khyed gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don de nyid zhu bar sems pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-15: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon 'di lnga yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-19: gzhal med khang chen por gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-20: bong steng bzang por grags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-23: grags pa dad ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:303b-26: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon dang po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304a-6: bdag dbang ba bdag gir bya ba mang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304a-12: bang ba'i tshogs mang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304a-20: zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304a-24: snag gi gnyen mtshams mang por 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304a-26: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon gnyis pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304a-32: mdog gser ltar bzang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304a-33: mgo gdugs ltar zlum pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304a-35: dpral ba dbyes che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304a-36: smin mtshams bar ma chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304a-38: nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304a-39: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304a-41: 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon gsum pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304a-44: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor bzang po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304a-45: bu stong gis bskor bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304b-3: nye bar 'tsho ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad de la gus par nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304b-6: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon bzhi pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304b-9: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304b-10: der skyes nas lha'i rgyal po khyad par can lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304b-12: lha'i bu mo rnams kyi rten du 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304b-13: gnas bcu po lha'i tshe dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304b-17: lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304b-22: reg bya rnams kyis dga' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304b-24: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon lnga pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304b-26: dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304b-27: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:304b-28: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharm'a ka ra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:305a-0: lo tstsha ba bande ye shes snying pos @305a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-021:305a-2: bande dpal brtsegs kyis zhus chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa //
